front.title: Service Discovery in On-Demand Ad Hoc Networks

abstract.t: In this document, we describe extensions to suitable ad hocnetwork routing protocols in order to provide support for servicediscovery. Typical Internet applications require informationsuch as name resolution, a web proxy IP address, access to printservices etc. While [manet] protocols have focussed on providingbasic routing support for communication, this document addressesthe problem of discovering services along with routes to thoseservices.
